# GenAI-Logic Manager - Project Workspace

Your workspace for creating and managing GenAI-Logic projects.

**What's here:** Sample databases, tutorial project (basic_demo), training materials, shared venv.

---

## ğŸ¯ New Here? Start with the Tutorial
```bash
genai-logic create --project_name=basic_demo --db_url=basic_demo
```

*(Project will auto-open with its own README and guided tour)*
